name: Britt Johnson
text: Jordyn is soooo very sweet and personable! Online shopping is so easy but I continue to come because she is there!

name: Sara Hardin
text: Love this store! Just wished they had larger sizes.. It seems like stores would realize they can't keep larger sizes in stock, they sell out immediately and the little kids sizes are always the ones that don't get sold!!

name: Sheila Mac10
text: Is this A Simply Obsessed Store like Sarah Gibbon's?

name: Tipawan Gallo
text: The store is nice and everything is stocked nicely and very neat. The styles are decent but unfortunately they do not carry XS. The clothing isn’t made for short, petite folks like myself. :(

name: Baylee Fuqua
text: I normally always pick dress up to shop in its close to my house and it’s somewhere me and my daughter both love. We have always had a wonderful experience but today not so much. Today my daughter and her friend decided we’d do some shopping and eating while they had their “big girl” lunch together I walked two stores down to dress up and decided I’d look for her a cute dress while they had their time together to chat! Found the cutest two dresses and proceeded to the check to ask if I could leave them there for ten mins while I walk literally two stores down. I’ve done this time and time before we always eat at the local restaurant connected to the strip mall. I was quickly told NO sorry we can’t hold anything. I was a little shocked and explained she was two doors down and I wanted to make sure they were a good fit due to them being final sale. The two looked at each other and said sorry because you can go online 24 hours and order we aren’t allowed to hold anything. Now if I’d previously not held something before maybe I’d believe them. One proceeded to say I’ll put it in the fitting room and we can just say she’s waiting on the fitting room!! Which means YOUR HOLDING IT. I smiled and told them that was ok and walked out needless to say I will only order from online or if I see the manager ( can’t remeber her name but she’s awesome) I’ll only shop then. These two youngsters possible need a lesson on customer service!!!

name: A M
text: Women working there were very helpful and I found some super cute unique items yesterday. I have been twice before and I try to occasionally stop by to see what might be in season. Prices are very affordable too for a more boutique style business. It is also where I get a lot of my crop tops, which can be hard to find in other stores here.

name: Cindy Kelley
text: Beautiful clothes,  great prices,  excellent customer service!

name: Jamie Householder
text: My wife's favorite boutique in Huntsville. New stuff every time we go, prices are reasonable, and you can even find markdowns and sales.

name: Nikki Nicole
text: I just went into this location to get a cocktail dress and  Brittany found the perfect dress for me and Erica was so pleasant. I would recommend this store to anyone looking for excellent customer service and affordable clothing.

name: Kristie Harris
text: Needs more salespeople. Can be hard to find parking . This store caters for teens.

resp.text:
Hi Kristie!💕
We would love to see you again soon! We get new arrivals every single Monday so there is something for everyone! If you don't see any available parking spots in front of the store we do have a parking garage that typically has many open spots!! I hope that helps!!

name: Olivia Sanborn
text: I bought a sweater at another location that was damaged. The girls at Dress Up Auburn we’re so helpful with the entire process of returning the sweater and ordering me the same one from another store. They even had the replacement sweater shipped to my house for free and it arrived in two days! I highly recommend these helpful ladies for all your boutique needs!

name: Destiny Lane
text: My new favorite boutique. Everyone I go, I get a pleasant surprise and I end up purchasing something. Great staff, very sweet young ladies.

name: Lauren Clayton
text: I absolutely love this store. Always knew merchandize and it's affordable! The associates are always very nice too which makes for a great atmosphere

name: Breanna Drake
text: My daughters went into this store today. They are 16 years old. The manager stopped them and accused them of stealing a $3.99 ring. She asked if they could search them and go figure they didn’t find anything!! Let me tell you something my kids do not have to steal nothing! Next time you go to search a minor you better have law enforcement or security there and you better pull video before you falsely accuse a minor. Do you know how embarrassing that is !! This manager got an ear full today and has not heard the last from this parent! I am calling my lawyer to find out what can be done about searching a minor without law enforcement around or contacting a parent!!

name: Samantha Drake
text: They really accused me of stealing when I was holding my friends jewelry while she was in the dressing room. They went through all my bags in front  of everyone and embarrassed me, and go figure they found nothing! Need I mention my friend literally showed her the jewelry I was holding for her and she still went through my bags. This was so wrong of them!!!

name: Phyllis Rembert
text: My niece loves this store, when I say love I mean love. If only you could see her closet. Aeropostale jeans, sweat suits, shirts. She loves this store.😍

name: Robert Wendling
text: Buy one get one free t-shirts, $30 for one, $10 a piece, not bad for Aeropostale.

name: Nina Smith
text:
Fast , friendly service
Took back some returns and despite it being busy I was in and out

name: Noretta Greene Nanny's Babies Nursery
text: Cute clothes and plenty of school uniforms!

name: lisa schreiner
text: Store was clean but they will get u on the sales so be careful

name: Cynthia Hutchinson
text: Tight store to walk in but its worth it for the cheap low cost on clothes

name: Saulat Ahmad
text: Racists and dont help they are rude to there colored employess by the look of it. I am asian. Came back to return somthing one of the girl was doing my return and everything was going fine until the short white guy came early 20s o guys and kept rolling his eyes and kept asking sure i dont wanna exchange and everytime i said no thanks he kept making rude faces. Worst customers service ever will never come back. The deal was good 3 shirts for 30 but my husband only liked one so i just had to return. Alll but i was treated like a i did a crime.

name: Front Desk
text: I would give no stars but it is not allowed. I just received the worst customer service ever from a young caucasisn manager with black hair and bumps all in her face and glasses and a young Caucasian boy with rwd bumos all in his face. The boy was my cashier and he was giving cash cards out to white customers only. When U asked for one, he gave me the worst stare. I have never been treated so ugly! I will never shop in that store again.

name: assilem
text: Not to happy having tI drive forty minutes back another day to have the security tags taken off. Then to be treated like we stole something. I had my receipt in my bag. Very very rude the day I returned on July 8th.

name: Robert Knight
text: Best clothes ever

name: DewN Nitek
text: The Bel Air Mall location has consistently been a great shopping environment. Too bad it will be closed by the end of the quarter.

name: Jovan Harris
text: My child love this store

name: Frank Haviland
text: Never been in there

name: Jo Kincaid
text: Loved it

name: Debra Colbert
text: To expensive

name: Vietlao
text: Was a bit messy when I went in

name: Debra Colbert
text: To expensive

name: Jo Kincaid
text: Loved it

name: ShottA ScOpeZ
text: Awesome

name: Evelyn Salinas
text: Good

name: minerva delgado rivera
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent

(Original)
Excelente
